text: The Idol is a 2015 Palestinian British Qatari Dutch Egyptian United Arab Emirates drama movie directed by Hany Abu-Assad and starring Tawfeek Barhom, Nadine Labaki, Ashraf Barhom, Saber Shreim. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 drama movies Category:Palestinian movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:Qatari movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:United Arab Emirates movies Category:Movies directed by Hany Abu- Assad
title: The Idol (2015 movie)
